attributes.action: Skilled workers  on tier2 visa ILR after 2 years instead of 5 years
attributes.additional_details:
Skilled workers are crying to complete 5 years due to unbearable pain and work load under the sponsor holder. Like chefs, health carers, they have to do lots hours without any extra money for extra hours,and have to work 5 years in same place or under a sponsor holder.
And lots sponsor holders misuse them. So I kindly request to 

 Give  ILR after 2 years instead of 5 years for all skilled workers.
